title: refactor(commands): reorganize execute commands into implement directory

bullets.text: investigated claude-md-manager.mjs processing behavior for multiple files in same directory
identified bug: each file in a directory triggered separate processing, causing excessive duplicate work
implemented session-level lock file mechanism to prevent duplicate processing
subbullets: added lock file check at start of backgroundWorker to skip if already processed
added parent session ID tracking to prevent child sessions from reprocessing

bullets.text: refactored file grouping logic to process directories once per session instead of per file
removed obsolete command files: commands/execute/implement-plan.md and commands/execute/quick-with-subtasks.md

title: removed agent parallelization examples from protocol files

bullets.text: cleaned up state-tracking protocol files by removing agent-parallelization examples

title: streamlined configuration by removing redundant protocols and commands

bullets.text: deleted planning output style (output-styles/planning.md) - 288 lines removed

subbullets: removed protocol sections from bug-fixing, code-review, and documentation

bullets.text: enhanced claude-md-manager.mjs with 281 additional lines of functionality
updated history.md with consolidated session entries
